artist: Yamamura Kōka (Toyonari); Publisher: Yamamura Kōka Hanga Kankōkai
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
markings: red artist's seal: 豊成 {Toyonari} | date seal: 大拾 {Tai jū} (1921)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled actor series, sometimes called Flowers of the Theatrical World (Rien no hana 梨園の華)
text: Seventh design in a set of twelve. Based on Morita Kan'ya XIII (1885-1932) as Jean Valjean in the play Les Misérables 哀史, performed at the Yūraku Theater, December 1920.
title: Actor Morita Kan'ya XIII as Jean Valjean
